headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Everest Group Is Shifting After New Targets and Strategy Moves
summary: Everest Group's narrative is shifting as the stock's price target rises, even while the underlying fair value estimate holds near $369 per share and key model assumptions stay largely intact. A modest reduction in the discount rate to about 6.96%, supported by growing confidence in earnings durability and reserve visibility, contrasts with cautious views on casualty trends and long term capital returns that are keeping revenue growth expectations near -7.83%. In this context of balanced...
